verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were of <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G1302>Why<s%> do your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3845>transgress<s%> the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders?<s%> for they <S%G3538>wash<s%> not their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1302>Why<s%> do you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3845>transgress<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> by <S%G5216>your<s%> tradition? <S%G3862><s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1781>commanded,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother:<s%> and, He that <S%G2551>curses<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him <S%G5053>die<s%> the death. <S%G2288><s%>

But you <S%G3004>say,<s%> Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to his <S%G3962>father<s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> It is a <S%G1435>gift,<s%> by whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you might be <S%G5623>profited<s%> by me;

And <S%G5091>honor<s%> not his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> he shall be free. <S%G2532>Thus<s%> have you <S%G208>made<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G208>none<s%> <S%G208>effect<s%> by <S%G5216>your<s%> tradition. <S%G3862><s%>
You <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> did <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> of you, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> draws <S%G1448>near<s%> to me with their <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> and <S%G5091>honors<s%> me with their <S%G5491>lips;<s%> but their <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G4206>far<s%> from me.
But in <S%G3155>vain<s%> they do <S%G4576>worship<s%> me, teaching <S%G1321><s%> for <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>commandments<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And he <S%G4341>called<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G191>Hear,<s%> and understand: <S%G4920><s%>

Not that which <S%G1525>goes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> a <S%G444>man;<s%> but that which <S%G1607>comes<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1492>Know<s%> you that the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G4624>offended,<s%> after they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying?<s%>

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G5451>plant,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> my <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> has not <S%G5452>planted,<s%> shall be <S%G1610>rooted<s%> up.

Let them <S%G863>alone:<s%> they be <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>leaders<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind.<s%> And <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3594>lead<s%> the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> shall <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the ditch. <S%G999><s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5419>Declare<s%> to us <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Are you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G188>yet<s%> <S%G801>without<s%> understanding? <S%G801><s%>

Do not you <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3539>understand,<s%> that <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G1531>enters<s%> in <S%G1519>at<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G5562>goes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2836>belly,<s%> and is <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the draught? <S%G856><s%>

But <S%G3588>those<s%> things <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> from the <S%G2588>heart;<s%> and they <S%G2840>defile<s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>

For out of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1831>proceed<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> <S%G4202>fornications,<s%> <S%G2829>thefts,<s%> <S%G5577>false<s%> <S%G5577>witness,<s%> blasphemies: <S%G988><s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> are the things <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> a <S%G444>man:<s%> but to <S%G5315>eat<s%> with <S%G449>unwashed<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> not a man. <S%G444><s%>
<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>coasts<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> of <S%G5478>Canaan<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G3725>coasts,<s%> and <S%G2905>cried<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me, O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David;<s%> my <S%G2364>daughter<s%> is <S%G2560>grievously<s%> <S%G1139>vexed<s%> with a <S%G1139>devil.<s%>

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> her not a <S%G3056>word.<s%> And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2065>sought<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G630>Send<s%> her <S%G630>away;<s%> for she <S%G2896>cries<s%> <S%G3693>after<s%> us.
But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I am not <S%G649>sent<s%> but to the <S%G622>lost<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> of the <S%G3624>house<s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> she and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G997>help<s%> me.
But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> It is not <S%G2570>meet<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G5043>children's<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and to cast <S%G906><s%> it to dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

And she <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3483>Truth,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1063>yet<s%> the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> of the <S%G5589>crumbs<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> from their <S%G2962>masters'<s%> <S%G5132>table.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, O <S%G1135>woman,<s%> great <S%G3173><s%> is your <S%G4102>faith:<s%> be it to you even as you will. <S%G2309><s%> And her <S%G2364>daughter<s%> was <S%G2390>made<s%> <S%G2390>whole<s%> from that <S%G1565>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3327>departed<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3844>near<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> and <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G2521>down<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

And <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, <S%G2192>having<s%> with them those that were <S%G5560>lame,<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G2974>dumb,<s%> <S%G2948>maimed,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2087>others,<s%> and <S%G4496>cast<s%> them <S%G4496>down<s%> <S%G3844>at<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> <S%G4228>feet;<s%> and he <S%G2323>healed<s%> them:

So <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2296>wondered,<s%> when they <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> the <S%G2948>maimed<s%> to be <S%G5199>whole,<s%> the <S%G5560>lame<s%> to <S%G4043>walk,<s%> and the <S%G5185>blind<s%> to <S%G991>see:<s%> and they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I have <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G4357>continue<s%> with me <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G5315>eat:<s%> and I <S%G2309>will<s%> not <S%G630>send<s%> them <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G3523>fasting,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G1590>faint<s%> in the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, From <S%G4159>where<s%> should we have <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> in the <S%G2047>wilderness,<s%> as to <S%G5526>fill<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude?<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you? And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2033>Seven,<s%> and a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G2485>little<s%> <S%G2485>fishes.<s%>
And he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

And he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> them, and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

And they did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and were <S%G5526>filled:<s%> and they <S%G142>took<s%> up of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> meat that was <S%G4052>left<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full.<s%>
And they that did <S%G2068>eat<s%> were <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G5565>beside<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> and <S%G3813>children.<s%>

And he <S%G630>sent<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and <S%G1684>took<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G3093>Magdala.<s%>
